metadata.title: CVE-2023-6601 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in FFmpeg's HLS demuxer. This vulnerability allowsbypassing unsafe file extension checks and triggering arbitrary demuxersvia base64-encoded data URIs appended with specific file extensions.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
